Title: It's Coming
Plot: Nathan learns of his father's plans, while Flint and Knox launch attacks on Hiro, Ando, Peter, and Claire. Meanwhile, Matt tries to revive Angela, Sylar meets with Elle, and Mohinder begins testing of his newest superpower formula.
GuestStars: Jamie Hector, Robert Forster, Kristen Bell, Brea Grant, Ntare Guma Mbaho Mwine
